Title: Structure
Definition: Costs associated with the loss of a physical structure such as a building or piece of infrastructure.

Title: Content
Definition: Costs associated with the loss of the physical contents of a structure.

Title: Product
Definition: Costs associated with the loss of products produced by businesses, which may or may not be physical items.

Title: Disruption (Business Interruption)
Definition: Costs associated with disruption to the planned operations of a business.
